author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 17-year-old boy was killed in a road accident near Ambur Town on Wednesday night.

According to police, Raghavan was waiting to cross the National Highway – 48 near Govindapuram Road along with his father Perumal (40). A driver of a container lorry had parked the vehicle on the roadside and gone to a nearby tea shop. When he returned, he had started the vehicle without noticing Raghavan, who was standing in front waiting to cross the stretch. Raghavan came under one of the front tyres of the lorry and was killed, police said, quoting Perumal’s complaint.

Following this, Ambur Town police have registered a case of causing death by negligence. The lorry driver is absconding, police said.
title: 17-year-old boy run over by lorry
